metadata.name: /// RAAVA & VAATU
metadata.description:
The moment was perfect for capturing the light, 
Where the camera was moving alongside the juggler's flight.
He opened the door of the ancient song,
That can only be seen when exposure is long.

By entering the realm of a spirit world
And harmonic convergence that has been twirled,
Raava and Vaatu are dancing in collision 
That only the Avatar can balance with his vision.
- Filip Borelli, 2021

Dedicated to Michael Dante DiMartino and the Avatar: The Last Airbender animated series.

Kinetic light painting photo - 2000 x 3000 px jpeg
From A DIFFERENT KIND OF PHOTOGRAPHY COLLECTION
Created by Filip Borelli 

// THE HOLDER of this NFT will have:
